June 19, 1982 D West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class A)
West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class A) 500 Test Piece Contest West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Bugle) west-of-england-bandsmen-s-festival-class-a
None
John O'Gaunt [Vinter]
Molinnis Park, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK March ('Heroic March' from 'Epic Symphony' - Percy Fletcher): 1 St Austell, 190 2 Mount Charles, 188 3 Kernow Brass, 183 4 St Dennis, 181
Best player: Wayne McCarthy, cornet, St Austell
Best Soprano Vivian Smitheram St. Keverne Best Solo Cornet Wayne McCarthy St. Austell Best Euphonium Anthony Reski Bugle Best Solo Horn Ian Sutton St. Austell Best Set of Basses St. Austell
A. R. Trudgian Youth Awards: Helen Rosevear, Simon Williams
July 18, 2010, 10:02 a.m. Aug. 1, 2013, 2:02 p.m.

2 Mount Charles Brass Band Hugh Camps
